snippet: Diner's Journal hears valentines to the cream-filled treat from higher-end food purveyors.
abstract: Diner's Journal hears valentines to the cream-filled treat from higher-end food purveyors.
lead_paragraph: The Twinkie is not on the endangered-species list yet, but Wednesday's bankruptcy filing by Hostess Brands has many Twinkie lovers thinking end-time thoughts. Indeed, the pastry's disappearance from the city's bodega shelves would leave a hole that Little Debbie herself would be hard pressed to fill.

headline.main: A Time, Perhaps, to Stock Up on Twinkies
